body:
Hi, I have two questions: 1. Can I use EnergyPlus Version 7.2 with honeybee ? If there is something that forces Honeybee to use the latest version of EnergyPlus can I disable that and use 7.2. 2. Secondly, is it possible to color different zones according to the energy consumed for cooling annually ? Thanks,
Sarith
topic: Using old version of EnergyPlus and Coloring zones by energy consumption
